item.title: Writing
item.description: 2021 "excavation" in Biological Creatures (online, forthcoming) 2020 Felicia Farr Lemmon Poetry Prize sponsored by the Academy of American Poets: Honorable Mention "Senesence" and "Stability is Just a Dulling" in Forum Magazine (print)
